content: lion brand pattern # 70117ad skill level easy level 2 jiffy® article #450 2 colors 5 balls each 10 balls total *ed note yarn amount may provide extra left over yardage* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm special stitch v_stitch gauge 3 v-stitches + 4 row = 4 in 10 cm with 1 strand each of a and b held together work in pattern with 1 strand each of a and b held together for 30 row do not break yarn crochet picot border to finish available in other lion brand yarns 70118ad 1 babysoft and microspun 70119a 2 cotton-ease 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/v_stitch-blankie-70118ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/little-v_stitch-blanket-70119a
